name: Jessie A. Heasley, Appellant, v. Jeremiah H. Heasley

judges: Before Geeen, Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
parties: Jessie A. Heasley, Appellant, v. Jeremiah H. Heasley.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mb. Justice Mitchell,
This is a cross-appeal from the same decree as No. 62 of October term, 1898, and is governed by the opinion in that case, filed herewith, ante, p. 539.
Appeal dismissed with costs.
opinions.author: Mb. Justice Mitchell,

casebody.head_matter:
Jessie A. Heasley, Appellant, v. Jeremiah H. Heasley.
Argued Nov. 1, 1898.
Appeal, No. 75, Oct. T., 1898, by defendant, from decree of C. P. No. 2, Allegheny Co., July T., 1896, No. 204, on bill in equity.
Before Geeen, Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
Affirmed.
May 23, 1898:
